generate red_sandstone stone
host
harvestLevel 1
hardness 2.0
texture strata:blocks/stone/strong/red_sandstone
textureCaps strata:blocks/stone/strong/red_sandstone_caps
blockstate strata:generic_cube_y
convertsTo minecraft:red_sandstone
lang.en Red Sandstone
